name: Mem Fault
description:
The goal is to make it through the maze of barriers and into the goal to collect the disks. You have to do this four times and the arena gets more chaotic each time.

I wanted to make a different game with a lot of the same elements as Leaper. There's random barrier openings, randomly spawned enemies, you have to get to the top to collect an item and repeat the process a few times... but I also made it third person and added in shooting.

  • First round: only the barrier maze.
  • Second round: introducing buggers that crawl along each row
  • Third round: introducing lasers that shoot through the whole row
  • Fourth round: introducing Skullets that float past and shoot towards the player

Controls:

All art, music, design, and game development was done by me in and for the GDKO round 5 game jam.
